result.reason: Allows users to specify an alternative configuration file at startup, enhancing flexibility for different environments or user profiles.
result.approach: Implement command-line argument parsing in ProgramRoot.cs to accept a file path for an alternative configuration file. Then, modify ConnectionsService.cs to use this path for loading connections if provided, falling back to the default if not.
